Siren Voice.name: Siren Voice
Siren Voice.flavor: Your words inflame the passions of your adversary, mesmerizing your enemy for a short time.
Siren Voice.onHit: The target is dominated until the end of your next turn or until the target is attacked.

Sune's Shield.name: Sune's Shield
Sune's Shield.flavor: With divine compassion, you ward your ally from harm at your own expense.
Sune's Shield.targets: Two allies within 5 squares of each other, or an ally within 5 squares of you and yourself
Sune's Shield.effect: Until the end of the encounter, any time one of the targets takes damage, the other target can choose to take half that damage in the first target’s stead.

Sune's Kiss.name: Sune's Kiss
Sune's Kiss.flavor: Your touch plants a seed of love in your foe’s heart, overwhelming your enemy. Harm that befalls you injures your foe as well.
Sune's Kiss.onHit: You push the target 4 squares, and the target is dazed (save ends). In addition, until the end of the encounter or until you are reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, each time you take damage, the target takes half as much damage as you took.
Sune's Kiss.onMiss: You push the target 2 squares, and the target is dazed until the end of its next turn.
